bug.author: yuzhu
bug.summary: Transformation can fail when csv files has a header
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.1.0 Describe the bug When a table stores its file as a csv file and it has headers, its property skip.header.line.count is not respected by the transformation and the transformation fails because of type mismatch. To Reproduce attach a database with a table that has csv as its data and the csv has a header. Expected behavior Expect the transformation to respect the header and the skip.header.line.count property Urgency fix before the next release Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.
